tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pricing_impact_analysis (
    product_id INT,
    date DATE,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sales_volume INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_performance (
  date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10,2),
  units_sold INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_changes (
  change_id INT,
  change_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  old_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  new_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  reason VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_changes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  price DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sales_performance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sale_id INT,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  quantity INT,
  date_sold DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SalesPerformance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE PricingChanges (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    old_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    new_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE SalesTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    month_year DATE,
    sales_volume INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    profit_percent DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ProfitabilityAnalytics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(12, 2),
    total_costs DECIMAL(12, 2),
    total_profit DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity_sold INT,
    sales_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE revenue (
    revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    total_sales DECIMAL(20,2),
    net_profit DECIMAL(20,2),
    forecast_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_history (
    pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    old_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    new_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    change_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sales_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sales_growth DECIMAL(10,2),
    profit_margin DECIMAL(10,2),
    review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    impact_metric VARCHAR(50),
    impact_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    analysis_date DATE
);
